Game.Plot: A new revolutionary game. Improvements at Kanto region, plus a special section with the Sevii Islands and their leaders. Complete and working 100% functional. Among major improvements, includes: Possibility of flying to all parts correctly. Leaders with revenge at Kanto. Improved graphics, more colorful & elegant. System clock automatically walk with 5 changes. System clock automatically walk with 7 weather times. New sprites renewed virtually all.
